tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: This lab provides an overview of Oracle GoldenGate Veridata advanced features.

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare Setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Environment Setup
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Initialize Environment
tutorials.description: How to initialize and start all the workshop components

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Create Datasource Connections
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the steps to create datasource connections.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Create Groups and Compare Pairs
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the steps to create groups and compare pairs.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Configure Delta Comparison
tutorials.description: This lab shows how to configure Delta Partitioning in Oracle GoldenGate Veridata.

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Configure Auto Partitions
tutorials.description: This lab shows how to configure Automatic Row Partitioning in Oracle GoldenGate Veridata.

tutorials.title: Lab 8: Configure Database Partitions
tutorials.description: This lab shows how to configure Database Partitioning in Oracle GoldenGate Veridata.

tutorials.title: Lab 9: Environment Cleanup
tutorials.description: Cleanly dispose of all OCI resources created by ORM for the workshop, and delete the stack

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
